column6: With S.H.I.E.L.D. convinced she's a Skrull impostor, Ms. Marvel must fight for her identity and her life against her very own Lightning Strike Force! But when the Force has a Ms. Marvel of their own, even Carol can't be sure she's Carol anymore!
column8: | inker:Mariah Benes | penciller (cover):Greg Horn | artist:Adriana Melo | writer:Brian Reed | letterer:Dave Sharpe | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
